header.title: snmpa_mib_storage

erlref.modulesummary: Behaviour module for the SNMP agent mib storage.

description.p: This module defines the behaviour of the SNMP agent mib storage.
The mib storage is used by the agent to store internal mib- related information. The mib storage module is used by several entities, not just the mib-server.
A snmpa_mib_storage compliant module must export the following functions:
The semantics of them and their exact signatures are explained below.

section.title: CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
section.p: The following functions must be exported from a mib-server data callback module:

func.name: Module:open(Name, RecordName, Fields, Type, Options) -> {ok, TabId} | {error, Reason}

desc.p: Create or open a mib storage table.
Note that the RecordName and Fields arguments my not be used in all implementations (they are actually only needed for mnesia-based implementations).
Note also that the Options argument comes from the options config option of the mib-storage config option, and is passed on as is.

func.name: Module:read(TabId, Key) -> false | {value, Record}
func.fsummary: Read a record from the mib-storage table

desc.p: Read a record from the mib-storage table.

func.name: Module:write(TabId, Record) -> ok | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Write a record to the mib-storage table

desc.p: Write a record to the mib-storage table.

func.name: Module:delete(TabId, Key) -> ok | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Delete a record from the mib-storage table

desc.p: Delete a record from the mib-storage table.

func.name: Module:match_object(TabId, Pattern) -> {ok, Recs} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Search the mib-storage table for record matching pattern

desc.p: Search the mib-storage table for record that match the specified pattern.

func.name: Module:match_delete(TabId, Pattern) -> {ok, Recs} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Delete records in the mib-storage table matching pattern

desc.p: Search the mib-storage table for record that match the specified pattern and then delete them. The records deleted are also returned.

func.name: Module:tab2list(TabId) -> Recs
func.fsummary: Return all records of the mib-storage table

desc.p: Return all records in the mib-storage table in the form of a list.

func.name: Module:info(TabId) -> {ok, Info} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Returns information about the mib-storage table.

desc.p: Retrieve implementation dependent mib-storage table information.
What this means, if anything, is implementation dependent.

func.name: Module:backup(TabId, BackupDir) -> ok | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Perform a backup of the mib-storage table

desc.p: Perform a backup of the mib-storage table.
What this means, if anything, is implementation dependent.
